identity.name: PromoGen
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Enterprise Density with Consumer Brand Energy
Content is King: Data is the hero, UI is the stage
Contrast: High contrast for readability, 'Energy Pink' for action

cards.style: Flat with subtle border, no shadow by default, lift on hover
cards.classes: border border-border/40 bg-card text-card-foreground hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients in 'Energy Pink' and 'Reckitt Blue' for hero backgrounds or active states, NEVER for full screens.

login_background.usage: Cover image for login page split layout

empty_state.usage: Placeholder for empty dashboards or loading states

promotion_effectiveness.layout: Filter Bar (Top) + Main Chart Area + Data Table (Bottom)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react recharts framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-popover @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-slider @radix-ui/react-checkbox @radix-ui/react-avatar @radix-ui/react-toast sonner date-fns react-day-picker
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Extend the theme with 'reckitt' colors defined in the colors section.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI as the base. Copy the code for Button, Card, Input, Select, Tabs, Dialog, etc., into src/components/ui.
5. THEME: Implement a ThemeProvider for Dark/Light mode toggling.
6. MOCK DATA: Create a robust mock data service for charts and tables since the backend might not be fully ready.
7. LOGO: Use the provided SVG at /reckitt_logo.svg. Ensure it's visible on both dark and light backgrounds (might need a white version for dark mode or a container).
8. TESTIDS: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'login-btn', 'kpi-card-value').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered text everywhere.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to all cards and buttons.
Data Density: This is an enterprise tool. Don't make things too big. Use whitespace intelligently but keep data dense.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met, especially with the Pink and Blue text.
